title: Calories in Fun Size Snickers
meta_description: Discover calories in fun size Snickers – about 80 per bar – plus full nutrition details on carbs, sugars, protein, fat, and sodium for smart snacking.
assumptions: Standard fun size Snickers bar (approx. 17g), milk chocolate-covered nougat with caramel and peanuts; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by manufacturer, batch, size, and storage; always check the package label for the most accurate information.

quick_answer.text: A fun size Snickers bar contains about 80 calories and 1g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp extra caramel drizzle per bar
Snickers Almonds variety (almonds instead of peanuts) per bar
Without chocolate coating (nougat, caramel, peanuts only) per bar

faqs.q: How many calories in fun size Snickers?
faqs.a: A standard fun size Snickers has about 80 calories.

faqs.q: What is the fat content in fun size Snickers?
faqs.a: Approximately 4g total fat, including 1.5g saturated fat.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in a fun size Snickers bar?
Does fun size Snickers contain protein?
faqs.a: Yes, about 1g of protein, mainly from the peanuts.

faqs.q: What is the sodium level in fun size Snickers?
faqs.a: Typically 45mg of sodium per fun size bar.
